title: Is There Any Hard Evidence Hannibal Took Elephants Over the Alps?
description: Hannibal's crossing of the Alps with war elephants is considered one of the most daring move of the Punic Wars. But is it professionally accepted among historians that he actually  crossed the Alps, and if so, is there any physical evidence?
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
itunes:subtitle: Hannibal's crossing of the Alps with war elephants is considered one of the most daring move of the Punic Wars. But is it professionally accepted among historians that he actually  crossed the Alps, and if so, is there any physical evidence?
itunes:summary: Hannibal's crossing of the Alps with war elephants is considered one of the most daring move of the Punic Wars. But is it professionally accepted among historians that he actually  crossed the Alps, and if so, is there any physical evidence?
